item.description:
BriefDating for Western Massachusetts
Find Your Summer Sweetheart!

Date: May 22, 2011, 6pm to 9pm
Cost: $33 (payment details at http://www.BriefDating.com)

Note: Usually 50 to 70 people attend BriefDating events including many people outside of Meetup.

Age Range: Approx. 30 to 50

Please note: pre-registration and pre-payment at http://www.BriefDating.com is required. No walk-ins allowed. Please see BriefDating.com for details.

BriefDating--A Great Way to Meet People!

* Meet many singles, quickly and easily
At these speed dating events you will have between 10 and 17 dates in one fun evening.

* Get a sense if you "click" in a few minutes
Each brief date is just 6 minutes.

* Safe and no pressure
You don't ask each other out. You just mark on your Dating Card if you like the person. Contact information is only sent when there is a match.

* BriefDating Works! These events have a 60% to 80% match rate!

Testimonial:

"For quite a long time I've been wanting to try speed dating. After being out of the dating world for many years I wasn't sure how to get back in! I was really feeling my lack of confidence and was quite overwhelmed with 'how do I meet available men?'

The great thing about BriefDating is that the whole reason all those men are there is because they are available! And looking! And since we were all in the same boat, feeling nervous together, we could take it with a sense of humor and have a good laugh about it.

Actually getting to meet men in person in a structured and supportive format made it so much easier. I really had fun that night. It gave me my confidence back that I really could enjoy the dating process." Andrea Rush

For all of the details and to sign up: http://www.briefdating.com

group.name: The Western Mass Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Speed Dating in Western Mass - Find Your Summer Sweetheart!
